amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: None of the funds in this Act may be used for the Emmanuel College Center for Science Partnership, MA.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 37 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds for the Emmanuel College Center for Science Partnership.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hensarling amendment (A042) Failed by recorded vote: 79 - 337 (Roll no. 638).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A042) offered by Mr. Hensarling.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Hensarling amendment (A042) Failed by recorded vote: 79 - 337 (Roll no. 638).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
